contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Primal Scream | Type = [[Album]] | Artist = [[Primal Scream]] | Cover = Primalscream_album_cover.jpg | Released = September 4, 1989 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Rock music|Rock]] | Length = 32:38 | Label = [[Creation Records]]/Mercenary Records (US) | Producer = [[Primal Scream|Sister Anne]] | Last album = ''[[Sonic Flower Groove]]''<br />(1987) | This album = '''''Primal Scream'''''<br />(1989) | Next album = ''[[Screamadelica]]''<br />(1991) }} {{Album ratings |rev1 = [[Allmusic]] |rev1score = {{Rating|2.5|5}} [{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r59496|pure_url=yes}} link] |rev2 = ''[[Digital Spy]] |rev2score = {{Rating|4|5}} [http://www.digitalspy.co.uk/music/a112497/primal-scream-beautiful-future.html link] |rev3 = ''[[Q magazine|Q]]'' |rev3score = {{Rating|3|5}} [http://www.q4music.com/nav?page=q4music.review.redirect&fixture_review=118181&resource=118181&fixture_artist=146596 December 2000] }} '''''Primal Scream''''' is the second album by Scottish [[indie rock]] band [[Primal Scream]]. Released in 1989 (see [[1989 in music]]) it took a harder rock approach than their debut album ''[[Sonic Flower Groove]]'' and did not achieve great success. However, the song "I'm Losing More Than I'll Ever Have" was later remixed to provide the breakthrough single "[[Loaded_(Primal_Scream_song)|Loaded]]" that appeared on their much celebrated third album ''[[Screamadelica]]''. ==Track listing== All tracks composed by Bobby Gillespie, Andrew Innes and Robert "Throb" Young # "Ivy Ivy Ivy" – 3:07 # "You're Just Dead Skin to Me" – 4:42 # "She Power" – 3:10 # "You're Just Too Dark to Care" – 3:09 # "I'm Losing More Than I'll Ever Have" – 5:11 # "Gimme Gimme Teenage Head" – 2:30 # "Lone Star Girl" – 3:14 # "Kill the King" – 3:30 # "Sweet Pretty Thing" – 2:20 # "Jesus Can't Save Me" – 1:45 ==Personnel== *[[Bobby Gillespie]] - vocals *[[Andrew Innes]] - guitar *Robert "Throb" Young - guitar *[[Martin Duffy (musician)|Martin Duffy]] - piano *[[Toby (drummer)|Philip Tomanov]] - drums *Henry Olsen - bass, orchestration {{Primal Scream}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Primal Scream (Album)}} [[Category:1989 albums]] [[Category:Primal Scream albums]] [[Category:Creation Records albums]]
